column5: Well guys just got off the phone with Lloyd and on May 7th I'll be heading to BOQ for a boat ride if we catch any fish that's a bonus.  Looking for 3 others to split the cost with me.   Remember fish are a bonus but when you fish with Lloyd you know the fishing is going to be good. Good times and good friends make a fun day Thanks again Lloyd for the great offer for myself and 3 other OFC members
After talking to you last night, I thought I would add another hour to your charter making it 10 hours for you and your group. Look forward to seeing you and your group in May
Now there is a killer deal for anyone that hasn't fished with Lloyd as of yet.
He's just adding an extra hour so he has time to prepare your fish!! lol
shhhhhhhhhhhhhh Wayne
open water season coming ever so close
can you PM me the cost, I may be able to work this in somehow
pm sent
Thanks for the PM Ron Messaged you Dan  Let me know what you guys think
Cost???
Pm sent. I'm in if there's any room left.
This is my best chance to get out there so I am in!
Well we have a full crew for this little boat ride that will last 10 hours  The crew Jose,radar,Dan Bouck,splashhopper
Can't wait!
how many more sleeps?
Looking forward to it!  Had a great time with Lloyd last year!
Sorry to say but splashhopper had to back out of this trip so we have a seat open up. If anyone is interested shoot me a pm. Only 1 month away from this 10 hour boat ride
great offer but wifes birthday and mothers day .....think getting that worked out is too much looking forward to lloyd trip later in season
pm sent
Thank you Vince for the PM we have filled the seat once again. Will see you all May 7th
bummer....would have liked to go!
Damn Jose you got me all excited again. Looking forward to seeing y'all.
